title: Moving charge - positive charge in E- and B-fields

content.question: A particle of charge <math alttext="positive q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi></mpadded></math> moves undeflected at a constant velocity through a region with a magnetic field between two charged plates, as shown. What is the direction of the magnetic field in the region between the plates?

choices.label: Up, toward the top of the page
Down, toward the bottom of the page

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
